title: Yahoo Mail app ditches passwords, gets redesign and new features
text:
Yahoo Mail app ditches passwords, gets redesign and new features 
Published By: AndroidAuthority.com - Today 
Yahoo has unveiled their new Mail update, and passwords are nowhere to be seen. Instead, Yahoo uses push notifications to vet your access ra...
